mcq.statement: Change the voice: I had hoped that they would fix my locker while I was away, but they didn’t.

options.a: I had hoped that my locker would be fixed while I was away, but it wasn’t
options.b: I  had hoped that my locker would be fixed while I was away, but it wasn’t
options.c: I  hoped that my locker would be fixed while I was away but it wasn’t
